DOC.brief_summary: This 6 month long study will assess an investigational medication for patients on dialysis with secondary hyperparathyroidism. The study will look at the effects on parathyroid hormone, calcium and phosphorus levels.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of an Investigational Medication for the Treatment of Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients must be receiving hemodialysis; * Have elevated parathyroid hormone levels; * Not be pregnant or nursing; and * Not have had a heart attack in the last 3 months.
